title.en: Prayer for Liberating Obstacles into Space

text.en: Awesome heruka Vajrakīlaya, drinker of blood,
Sole embodiment of all the wrathful kings’ activity,
text.en-trans: trogyal yong kyi trinlé chik tu dü

text.en: As terrifyingly majestic as the fires at the end of time—
text.en-trans: rab jik dü té mé tar zijin bar

text.en: To you I pray: dispel all obstacles and causes of harm!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so barché tsewa sol
